title: Enemy team somehow got Gangplank, guess we automatically lose
body:
But hey, at least we nerfed his R by a couple of damage!

While completely ignoring the part where his barrels can almost one shot a late game ADC and shred any melee champions that try to CS in a Gangplank lane.

Can we please get a better balance team?

replies.body:
Another day, another moronic, flame-filled Yenn thread.

Guess who he got trashed by today?

Really, because the barrels have the most counterplay out of GP's entire kit, you can see the animation of them coming down and there's a fucking countdown that basically lets you know "Hey, I'm about to blow up shit around my immediate vicinity." Plus, if you're in range to get hit by a barrel (not a combo chain, just a single barrel) then you're probably in range to auto it and kill it if you can time it. They're quite a bit easier to deal with than the rest of his abilities, and that's why they hurt more. And to dodge Barrel chains, you just need to position carefully (especially near bushes you don't have vision of) so that you can react if he sets up a chain, and it's easier to dodge if you have a blink or dash.

Also, think about this. Say you gut GP's barrels (Which are a primary core function of his kit) so that the damage is significantly lowered. This could throw him completely out of viability, so instead the team lowered the power of other parts of his kit to compensate for the large amount of damage the barrels do. Not saying GP is 100% balanced, but he's strong when picked against someone who lets him scale for free, his early game is rather slow before Trinity Force.

Also, he's kind of supposed to be able to do damage, he's a late game Carry and if he tries to mostly use Auto's in a teamfight he should probably get blown up assuming the enemy isn't a sack of potatoes.

It's pretty much how it is. In about 15 seconds you're going to get a bunch of

1) Downvotes
2) Weirdos who for some reason think gangplank is remotely balanced
3) Weirdos who search your summoner name to see if you main yasuo to call you out on it

But you got me.. Instead

And im going to say this

Fuck gangplank and whoever designed that overloaded anti-gankable no-such-thing-as-armor and im going to double kill your bot lane from top - champion
This is yenn, he just picks a champ to cry about each day. GP is not exactly imbalanced right now.
And if it's not that some champ is unbalanced, it's that something is wrong with Kennen

Or ult you if it's up, which doesn't do much damage unless you stand in it forever.
